Your Life in Circles - A Visual Life Tracker

Transform your new tab page into a meaningful and personal experience with “Your Life in Circles.” This minimalist extension visually represents the years of your life with 90 hand-drawn circles, each representing a year. As you set your birthdate and expected lifespan, the circles fill up to show your current age, reminding you of the preciousness of time.

Features:

	•	Visual Life Tracker: Each circle represents a year of your life. See how far you’ve come and how much more there is to explore.
	•	Personalized Experience: Customize your lifespan and watch the circles fill in real-time.
	•	Notes for Each Year: Hover over a circle to add personal notes or memories for that specific year.
	•	Elegant Design: Simple, clean, and visually appealing with a hand-brushed aesthetic.
